posts.post_title: 1899-1900 Sporting News Sup M101-1 Kid Nichols and James Williams for sale SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Both are trimmed down to 9x11 and have a small pin hole at the top but very very nice.
 
Kid Nichols $500 SOLD
James Williams $250 SOLD
